summary: The Block's Director of Research Larry Cermak hosted a panel discussion on institutional DeFi adoption.
title: Challenges for Institutional DeFi — Brought to you by Curv
content: The Block’s Director of Research Larry Cermak hosted a panel discussion on institutional DeFi adoption.
As a precursor to the event view our latest research piece exploring the hurdles faced by institutions participating in DeFi
You can learn more about our panelists and view the event in its entirety below:
